product_name: The North Face Alemany Plaid Shirt - Women's
long_description: The women's Alemany Plaid Shirt from The North Face gives you cool coverage on hot sunny days or just-right warmth on cool hikes in shady woods. Cotton plaid poplin features cuffs and back yoke on the bias. Front and cuffs close with horn buttons; button-tabs hold rolled-up sleeves just below the elbows. The Alemany Plaid Shirt from The North Face has 2 patch-style chest pockets.
short_description: The women's Alemany Plaid Shirt from The North Face gives you cool coverage on hot sunny days or just-right warmth on cool hikes in shady woods.
